name: Weng Santos
text: I really have no emotions about the burial.  I don't know why.  But yun nga, it's a corpse eh.  It can't declare martial law, it can't issue arrest search seizure orders, it can't do anything corrupt, it can't steal.  Much more now that it's 6 feet underground.    If pushed to determine its symbolic value, well, its value to me is as the lifeless body of a dead dictator who can't hurt me anymore.
